trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.CloudStorageAccount</codeEntityReference> class using the specified credentials, and specifies whether to use HTTP or HTTPS to connect to the storage services.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.CloudStorageAccount</codeEntityReference> class using the specified credentials, and specifies whether to use HTTP or HTTPS to connect to the storage services.

trans-unit.source: <codeInline>true</codeInline> to use HTTPS to connect to storage service endpoints; otherwise, <codeInline>false</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: <codeInline>true</codeInline> to use HTTPS to connect to storage service endpoints; otherwise, <codeInline>false</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Using HTTPS to connect to the storage services is recommended.
trans-unit.target: Using HTTPS to connect to the storage services is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.CloudStorageAccount</codeEntityReference> class using the specified credentials and endpoint suffix, and specifies whether to use HTTP or HTTPS to connect to the storage services.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.CloudStorageAccount</codeEntityReference> class using the specified credentials and endpoint suffix, and specifies whether to use HTTP or HTTPS to connect to the storage services.

trans-unit.source: The DNS endpoint suffix for all storage services, e.g. "core.windows.net".
trans-unit.target: The DNS endpoint suffix for all storage services, e.g. "core.windows.net".

trans-unit.source: <codeInline>true</codeInline> to use HTTPS to connect to storage service endpoints; otherwise, <codeInline>false</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: <codeInline>true</codeInline> to use HTTPS to connect to storage service endpoints; otherwise, <codeInline>false</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Using HTTPS to connect to the storage services is recommended.
trans-unit.target: Using HTTPS to connect to the storage services is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.CloudStorageAccount</codeEntityReference> class using the specified credentials and service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.CloudStorageAccount</codeEntityReference> class using the specified credentials and service endpoints.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the primary Blob service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the primary Blob service endpoint.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the primary Queue service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the primary Queue service endpoint.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the primary Table service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the primary Table service endpoint.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the primary File service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the primary File service endpoint.
